name: Storm Eyes
description: Centers of perpetual storms create unique environments and potential sources of storm magic. The storm energy provides unique power sources and magical opportunities, while the constant storms and lightning create constant danger.
atmosphere: Perpetual storm systems create eyes of calm surrounded by walls of wind and lightning while thunder provides constant percussion. Lightning rods and storm collection devices attempt to harness the raw energy. The air crackles with ozone and electrical charge. Dangerous but potentially valuable source of storm magic.
